Mayor Amir Omar
===============

[Font Size:](javascript:void(0); "default font size")
[+](javascript:void(0); "larger font size")
[-](javascript:void(0); "smaller font size")

[Share & Bookmark](javascript:void(0); "Click to expand Share & Bookmark options")
Share & Bookmark, Press Enter to show all options, press Tab go to next option

* [Email](javascript:void(0); "Click to submit an email online")
* [Facebook](javascript:shareLink('facebook') "Click to share with Facebook")
* [LinkedIn](javascript:shareLink('linkedin') "Click to share with LinkedIn")
* [Twitter](javascript:shareLink('twitter') "Click to share with Twitter")
* [Reddit](javascript:shareLink('reddit') "Click to share with Reddit")

[Feedback](javascript:void(0); "Click to submit an email to feedback")

Mayor
-----





![Mayor Amir Omar](https://www.cor.net/home/showpublishedimage/45519/638830038126030000)

**Contact Information**[Amir.Omar@cor.gov](mailto:Amir.Omar@cor.gov)

Amir is a father of 3 adult children and lives in NE Richardson with his wife, Alika. A 1st-generation American, he was born in Milwaukee, WI, and moved to Texas in the 1st grade, graduating from Harlingen High. He earned a bachelor’s degree from Texas A&M where he was a member of the Aggie Corps of Cadets and an Executive MBA from UT Dallas. A graduate of Leadership Richardson, the FBI Citizens Academy, and Richardson Police and Fire Academies, Amir has dedicated his career to community service.

In 2009, Amir was elected as Place 7 Council Member for the City of Richardson and was re-elected in 2011. His leadership earned him the 2012 One Man Dallas award and the Regional Community Leader of the Year. While on council, Amir championed the “Tree the Town” program as well as Richardson’s community garden program.

After his council service, he led the Duck Creek Neighborhood for two years. He is currently a Senior VP at HydroPoint Data Systems where he has worked for over a decade.

City Hall Services are currently located at:  

Temporary City Hall Annex  
2360 Campbell Creek Blvd. Suite 550  
Richardson, TX 75082



972-744-4100
  
Mailing Address P.O. Box 830309  
Richardson, TX 75083-0309  
[View Richardson Projects](https://www.cor.net/departments/capital-projects-engineering/public-project-input/capital-project-tracker-map)

[Report an Issue](https://www.cor.net/departments/community-services/code-enforcement/express-a-concern)

[![](https://www.cor.net/home/showpublishedimage/17261/638260480152170000)](mailto:askrichardson@cor.net "Email")
